1. Introduction.text: Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our holiday planner app (the "App"). Please read this policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this policy, please do not use the App.

text: • Personal Information : We may collect personal information that you provide to us, such as your name, email address, travel preferences, and payment details.
• Usage Data : We automatically collect certain information about your device and usage of the App, such as IP address, browser type, and activity within the App.
• Location Data : With your consent, we may collect information about your location to provide personalized recommendations and itinerary planning.
• To provide and manage the App's features and services.
• To personalize your experience and provide tailored recommendations.
• To process payments and manage your bookings.
• To improve our services and develop new features.
• To communicate with you regarding your account and app updates.
• Service Providers : Third-party vendors who perform services on our behalf, such as payment processing and customer support.
• Business Transfers : In the event of a merger, sale, or acquisition, your information may be transferred as part of the transaction.
• Legal Requirements : If required by law, we may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations or protect our rights.

5. Data Security.text: We use industry-standard security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

text: • Access Update Information : Manage your personal information within the App settings.
• Opt-out : Unsubscribe from marketing communications by following the instructions in the communication.
• Location Services : Disable location services in your device settings.

7. Children Privacy.text: Our App is not intended for use by children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware of such information, we will delete it immediately.

8. Changes to Policy.text: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on the App and updating the effective date.

9. Contact Us.text: If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at catloke963@gmail.com
